name: Bubble Vase, sea green
description:
These pieces are handblown directly over the wood piece it rests on.  Spontaneous and free flowing- these are moments in time where the piece is made in response to the wood.  The texture and character of the wood is imprinted on the glass and this is how the glass fits onto the piece.   They fit together as a result of the making process.  Each piece is unique and cannot be duplicated, they are literally a moment in time.
Sculptural, organic and functional.  
Signed on bottom.

measurements: glass- 8 inches high and about 4 inches wide; wood- about 7 inches in length
***To be notified directly about the next batch of bubble vases you can contact me at hpalmer@me.com or use the contact link at the top of the page

name: Bubble Vase, light steel blue, (HP-BV-LSB-02)
description:
Sculptural, organic and functional. 

*This piece measures about 7 inches in diameter, about 5 inches tall and rests on a piece of wood that is 10 inches long. It is a light steel blue. 

Spontaneous and free flowing- these pieces capture the moment where the glass is blown directly over the wood. The hot glass forms around all the knobs and bends and takes on the unique shapes and textures which ensure a good fit of glass with wood. For an even better “fit” with the wood, a copper rivet is added to the wood before the hot glass is blown over it giving the glass a defined point to shape itself around. Walking the border between decoration and sculpture these pieces are original and each piece is one of a kind and made with wood foraged from the California coast. 
Signed on bottom.

*Measurements are approximate

name: Nest, small opaque white
description:
This little sculpture adds a delicate touch of texture where it is placed.  In opaque white glass this piece measures 5 inces in diameter and 2.5 inches tall. It is the smallest of the nest series( medium and large also available). The open lattice work makes these pieces appear to be light as a feather. And, while they are delicate the overall form is sturdy, like actual nests. The process used to make these ensures that no two are ever alike. Each is unique with its own twists and bends. 
Signed on bottom.

name: Feather dish, spring green
description:
These are great little objects by day and fantastic votives by night. They capture both ambient light and candle light. 
This one is a cool shade of aqua and measures about 3 inches in diameter and about 4 inches tall.

name: Air plant hammock (aqua cream and red)
description:
Graceful enough to stand alone but made to hold tea-light candle and air plants. This medium size hangs about 3 feet long and the glass dish is about 3 inches tall and 4.5 inches wide. You can hang them from the ceiling or from a hook in the wall as shown in the picture.

The colors in this piece are light aqua, cream with three thin red accent stripes.

* please be safe if using with tea lights. only use tea-lights that are contained in plastic or metal. ensure that they are burning in a safe place free from fumes and not near anything flammable. and of course never leave unattended.

name: *SALE Red Nest, small
description: While I call them Nests, these pieces are often described as "oceany" or "like coral", this red one definitely looks like coral. The red is a true red. It is bright and eye catching and will add a bold touch of color where ever it is placed. The open lattice work makes these pieces appear to be light as a feather. And, while they are delicate the overall form is sturdy, like actual nests. The process used to make these ensures that no two are ever alike. Each piece is unique with its own twists and bends. Signed on bottom. Measures 5 inches in diameter and about 2.5 inches high. Available in three sizes, small size shown here plus medium and, large Pin It

The open lattice work makes these pieces appear to be light as a feather. And, while they are delicate the overall form is sturdy, like actual nests. The process used to make these ensures that no two are ever alike. Each is unique with its own twists and bends. All nests colors are available in all sizes, if you don't see the size you are looking for please ask. This small piece measures 5 inches in diameter and approx. 2.5 inches high at its highest point. name: Nest wall grouping- (price shown for one small, one medium, one large)
description:
Nests are now available vertically!
Groupings or singles can be in any size or color.  Mounted by a stand-off glued (with a specially formulated glass adhesive) to the bottom of the piece which locks into a bracket attached to the wall.  The grouping or single piece will be custom, so get in touch when you're ready and we can discuss options and get your order going.  Contact me through the contact page or directly here: hpalmer@me.com

**The picture shows a grouping but the price listed is for one small nest only.  Not for all the pieces.

**The prices will be the same as the price of whichever size nest you choose plus a three dollar up-charge for each bracket.

The biggest nest size yet.   The extra large nest definitely makes a statement.  Measuring 14 inches in diameter and approximately 5 and a half inches tall (at the tallest point) these pieces are great for a table top display or in the entryway.  Also a great size to add to a grouping of the smaller sized nests.

This listing is for a red in the extra large size, but these ones are available in more colors.  You can email for more info.
